BIO

Hi, I'm Ben!

I am a hardworking individual who thrives to seek more knowledge when it comes to front end web development. I spend most of my free time practicing all kinds of frameworks and libraries to bolster my knowledge and skills to improve myself and my work.

I am aspiring to having a career at the forefront of creative tech innovation.

In school, I never really tried to do well. I spent most of my time messing around as kids do, but coming up to the end of the final year of school, I decided I wanted to pursue programming. This is what led me to do Games Development in College.

University of York

Info:

I decided to go to the University of York to study Interactive Media as I knew it would involve all sorts of programming. I found solving problems was enjoyable and it gave me a sense of euphoria when I was able to solve a problem on a website. This made me realise that this is what I wanted to pursue.
